clues.text: The Koran begins, "In the name of" him, "most benevolent, ever-merciful"

Of 5 weeks, 5 months or 5 years, the earliest age at which a rat can begin breeding

rounds.text: With fewer than 10 member cities in attendance, this association based in Lubeck held its last assembly in 1669
